str2: Or heneken hen'-ek-en or heineken hi'-nek-en; of uncertain affinity; on account of.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: A primary verb; properly, to lead; by implication, to bring, drive, go, pass, or induce.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
From hegeomai; a leader, i.e. Chief person of a province.
A king, ruler, but in some passages clearly to be translated: emperor. Probably from basis; a sovereign.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Neuter of a presumed derivative of martus; something evidential, i.e. evidence given or, the Decalogue.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Probably from etho; a race, i.e. A tribe; specially, a foreign one.
